outputs.output_descr:
COMPONENT 1 : CLIMATE RISK ASSESSMENT AND FORECASTING 
Output 1.1: Functional early warning system which allows for climate change predictions tested
Output 1.2: Gishwati integrated hydro-meteorological logical model system established, integrating climate change risk assessment and socio-economic parameters
Output 1.3: Data coordination network is established through inter-agency coordination mechanism for EWS

COMPONENT 2 : CLIMATE CHANGE ADAPTATION PLANNING AND RESPONSE STRATEGIES
Output 2.1: Climate change sensitive disaster management plans are prepared for Nyabihu District in the Gishwati ecosystem and the capacity to implement them is developed
Output 2.2: Climate resilient Gishwati Land-use Master Plan adopted, implemented and regularly updated

COMPONENT 3 : REDUCTION IN THE ADVERSE EFFECTS OF FLOODS AND DROUGHTS THROUGH INCREASED ENVIRONMENTAL RESILIENCE AGAINST CLIMATE SHOCKS IN THE NILE-CONGO CREST WATERSHEDS (NYABARONGO AND SEBEYA RIVERS) AND GISHWATI ECOSYSTEM
Output 3.1: Land-use management practices in Gishwati pilot areas are adjusted for anticipated climate change risks
Output 3.2: Resettlement from priority watershed conservation areas advanced
Output 3.3: Capacity development program for communities and Gishwati-based practitioners formulated and implemented

COMPONENT  4: INCREASED KNOWLEDGE OF GOOD PRACTICES TO REDUCE VULNERABILITY TO CLIMATE CHANGE BASED ON GISHWATI PILOT
Output 4.1: Communication and Awareness strategy in place
Output 4.2: Training plan developed and implemented for relevant stakeholders for uptake of lessons learned and engagement in the various project components
Output 4.3: Lessons learned for policy makers and communities developed and disseminated throughout the project

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The programme aims to enhance hte contribution of sound environmental management to poverty reduction, sustainable economic growth and the achievement of the Millenium Development Goals.

project_descr: Reducing vulnerability to climate change by establishing early warning and disaster preparedness systems and support for integrated watershed management in flood prone areas
project_title: PIMS4109 FSP: Rwanda Climate Change Adaptation(GEF-LDCF)
